title: Africa: an introduction
creator_credit: Wayne Mitchell and BFA Educational Media
brief_description: Provides an overview of the people and the continent of Africa. Notes the different races of people, their history and social conditions that exist today including the system of apartheid. Also looks at the geography of the continent showing diversity between grasslands, desert and tropical areas. Briefly mentions African problems such as housing and education.
